package.name: iCleaner Pro.
package.shortDescription: The first real iOS system cleaner & optimizer.

descriptionlist.description: Remove unused languages, keyboards and voice assets. Remove definition dictionaries. Delete unused application assets. Delete wallpapers. Reset preferences of apps and tweaks. Move the Fonts folder from/to the system partition. (iOS 6 and below) Launch it via its shortcuts, URL schemes or from the command line. Much, much more. Check the website and user guide to learn more.
